description: This file defines the CategoryRowsAdapter class, a RecyclerView adapter used in an Android TV app to display categories of videos, each with a nested horizontal list of videos. It manages view holders, binds category data, and handles focus navigation among nested RecyclerViews.

classes.name: CategoryRowsAdapter
classes.description: A RecyclerView adapter for displaying categories, each with a horizontal list of videos, supporting nested focus and scroll management.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and initializes a new ViewHolder for a category row.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds a category to a view holder, setting the title and configuring the nested video list.

methods.name: getItemCount
methods.description: Returns the total number of categories.

methods.name: requestFocusFor
methods.description: Programmatically scrolls to and sets focus on a specific row and column within the nested lists.

inner_classes.name: RowVH
inner_classes.description: ViewHolder for a category row, containing references to the title TextView and nested RecyclerView.
